without other pre-processing.
(c) Other recovery: any waste-recovery operation that serves a useful purpose by replacing
other materials. Notably, it includes energy recovery (e.g. incineration with energy
recovery).
(d) Disposed waste: waste that is not recovered (recycled or otherwise diverted from
disposal) and is sent to landfill or other disposal methods.
